attributes.action: Demand that Civil Servants actually read the letters they receive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been forced today to write for the FORTH time to 10 Downing Street, but cannot obtain a satisfactory answer to my questions as the Civil Servants at 10 Downing Street do not read the letters and consider the responce, they merely skim through and then make a half hearted attempt at a response (Normally with an excuse. I insist that they be forced to read and then consider the correct response before replying, instead of either a botched attempt or passing the buck.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
